Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.GameModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModelInterface
public class GameModel extends Object implements ModelInterface
Class that defines all the possible action on the Model and send response to the GameController

  • Method Details

    • CreateGame

      public void CreateGame(ArrayList<String> players, String gameFilePath)
      Creates the game with all the necessary things (board, bookshelves, personal goals and common goals).
      Specified by:
      CreateGame in interface ModelInterface
      Parameters:
      players - is the list with all the players' nicknames
      gameFilePath - the path to the json file of the game

    • resumeGame

      public void resumeGame(ArrayList<String> onlinePlayers, com.google.gson.JsonObject json, String gameFilePath)
      Called at the beginning of the game when the first player wants to resume one of the game he's into.
      Specified by:
      resumeGame in interface ModelInterface
      Parameters:
      onlinePlayers - the list of the players of this game already online and ready to play.
      json - the jsonObject with all the details of the game (taken from the file).
      gameFilePath - the path of the file with all game's details.

    • InsertCard

      public void InsertCard(String nickname, ArrayList<ItemCard> cards, int column) throws NoBookshelfSpaceException, NotSameSelectedException
      Tries to insert cards in a nickname's bookshelf.
      Specified by:
      InsertCard in interface ModelInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the owner of the bookshelf
      cards - to be inserted into the bookshelf
      column - of the bookshelf to insert cards into
      Throws:
      NoBookshelfSpaceException - if there's no space in the column indicated
      NotSameSelectedException - if the player wants to insert cards different from the ones selected.

    • selectCard

      public void selectCard(String player, ArrayList<Integer> positions) throws NoRightItemCardSelection, NoBookshelfSpaceException
      Tries to select cards from the board.
      Specified by:
      selectCard in interface ModelInterface
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player
      positions - of the cards to be selected.
      Throws:
      NoRightItemCardSelection - if the selection is not valid.
      NoBookshelfSpaceException - if there's no enough space in a player's bookshelf for the number of tiles he selected.

    • setListener

      public void setListener(PropertyChangeListener listener)
      Set the controller as a GameModel's listener.
      Specified by:
      setListener in interface ModelInterface
      Parameters:
      listener - to be set.

    • calcFinalScore

      public LinkedHashMap<String,Integer> calcFinalScore()
      Calculates all the players' final score and sends it to each of them
      Specified by:
      calcFinalScore in interface ModelInterface
      Returns:
      a set (whose size is > 1 only in case of parity) with all the winners.

    • EndTurn

      public void EndTurn(String nickname)
      Called at the end of a turn, checks if common goals have been reached from the current player, and if the board needs to be refilled.
      Specified by:
      EndTurn in interface ModelInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the current player.
